pkgmetadata.longdescription: An 'Armadillo' Interface // Provides function declarations and inline function definitions that facilitate communication between R and the 'Armadillo' 'C++' library for linear algebra and scientific computing. This implementation is detailed in Vargas Sepulveda and Schneider Malamud (2024) doi:10.1016/j.softx.2025.102087.
